modules.name: basesystem
modules.summary: The skeleton package which defines a simple CentOS Linux system
modules.description:
Basesystem defines the components of a basic CentOS Linux
system (for example, the package installation order to use during
bootstrapping). Basesystem should be in every installation of a system,
and it should never be removed.

projects.name: filesystem
projects.summary: The basic directory layout for a Linux system
projects.description:
The filesystem package is one of the basic packages that is installed
on a Linux system. Filesystem contains the basic directory layout
for a Linux operating system, including the correct permissions for
the directories.
